item.title: Trump picks Project 2025 co-author Russell Vought to lead budget office
item.description: Trump named Vought, who played a central role in designing Project 2025, to head up the Office of Management and Budget in his second term.

item.title: Trump picks Dr. Marty Makary, a Johns Hopkins surgeon, for FDA chief
item.description: Makary, who will need to be confirmed by the Senate, has defended controversial Trump cabinet pick Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

item.title: Donald Trump chooses hedge fund executive Scott Bessent for Treasury secretary
item.description: The founder of Key Square Group was deemed a strong favorite to lead the Treasury Department, along with several other contenders.

item.title: Investor focus shifts to rate cut outlook on Thanksgiving week, with Fed minutes and inflation data ahead
item.description: The interest rate outlook will come back into focus next week with key inflation data and Federal Reserve meeting minutes coming out ahead of Thanksgi...

item.title: Supreme Court to hear a new challenge to the scope of federal agency power
item.description: Case taking aim at the Federal Communications Commission's program requiring companies to subsidize services in rural areas raises big constitutional ...
